context: Have you read the newest book by ursula k. le guin the chicken flew over the coo-coo nest?
No, I haven't read that. Sounds interesting, did you know she also wrote The Tombs of Atuan?
Wow! I absolutely love that novel! I got so excited at the end when she fell in love with the mummy.
resp: If you haven't read The Other Wind, I would recommend that one as well.
